resources.string: The app has a built-in camera for taking quick pictures. If you would like to use this, please allow the Camera permission. Otherwise you can pick pictures from external sources. Press OK if you would like to use the built-in camera in the app.

To import images from external sources, the app needs to read from your device\'s external storage. Alternatively, you can take pictures with the built-in camera in the app. Press OK if you would like to import external images.
